item.description:
Rousseau: Discourse on the Origins and Foundations of Inequality Among Men

At our last meeting we settled on the short term plan of
1. Rousseau
2. de La Mettrie(Machine Man),
3. Hume(An Enquiry Concerning Human Understanding)
4. Kant(?).

Rousseau's discourse is available on the web:
Discourse on the Origins and Foundations of Inequality Among Men
http://www.19.5degs.c...
http://www.questia.co...

Please follow the e-mails until the next meeting since we maybe able to add more links. We would be particularly interested in links that also have Rousseau's notes about this discourse.
item.name: Rousseau: Discourse on the Origins and Foundations of Inequality Among Men
